page.title: 13A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY (CONT)
page.content:
12.40 We go out for break. 13.15 School begins for the afternoon. 13.15 Games session. 14.15 We change back into school uniform. 14.20 Reading time. 14.30 Afternoon Break. 14.45 End of break and we come in for storytime. 15.25 The bell rings for home-time. 15.30 Dismissal. 16.00 The bus arrives in the village. 16.05 I feed the hens. 16.20 Watch television. 18.00 The family has tea. 18.30 Read 19.30 Watch television. 20.00 I go to the Youth Club. 22.00 Go home from Youth Club. 22.05 I have a bath and go to bed.
Caroline Higgins
